Binary: fontconfig, fontconfig-config, fontconfig-udeb, libfontconfig-dev, libfontconfig1-dev, libfontconfig1, libfontconfig-doc
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), docbook, docbook-utils, libfreetype-dev (>= 2.8.1), libexpat1-dev, uuid-dev, pkgconf, python3:any, gperf, po-debconf
Package-List: fontconfig deb fonts optional arch=any fontconfig-config deb fonts optional arch=any fontconfig-udeb udeb debian-installer optional arch=any profile=!noudeb profile:v1=!noudeb libfontconfig-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libfontconfig-doc deb doc optional arch=all profile=!nodoc profile:v1=!nodoc libfontconfig1 deb libs optional arch=any libfontconfig1-dev deb oldlibs optional arch=any
